title: HGUC 1/144 BOUND-DOC
hg-1-144-bound-doc
description:
HGUC 1/144 BOUND-DOC
Estimated Arrival September 
The Baund Doc from "Mobile Suit Z Gundam" gets a new HG kit release from Bandai! Standing 19cm tall when completed, this uniquely designed machine can show off its Mobile Armor and Mobile Suit variable gimmicks without compromising its proportions, including folding its upper body into its waist skirt armor. The power pipes are made of elastomer material for flexibility, and it comes with its beam rifle, diffusion mega particle cannon and beam saber, as well as a base for display. Order it for your own collection today!

title: HG 1/144 RX-78-2 Gundam [BEYOND GLOBAL]
hg-1-144-rx-78-2-gundam-beyond-global
description:
HG 1/144 RX-78-2 Gundam [BEYOND GLOBAL]
Gunpla 40th Anniversary! Consolidate the technologies cultivated in the "HG Series" and create a three-dimensional "RX-78-2 Gundam" designed by Kunio Okawara!■ We pursue "beautiful posing" and "moving performance and proportion". A number of gimmicks are provided throughout the body that allow for natural poses.■ A design that reexamines the design of First Gundam and pursues it to the limit as "BEYOND GLOBAL".■ Adopts forward bending and swing movable structure for the body. The neck axis is also movable back and forth.■ We add joint to bend inward at the base of thigh part and realize posing more like human.■ By the independent movement of the wrist, it is possible to freely move the shield that has been jointed.■ The wrist block is movable as a separate part with a ball joint, and has a structure that can produce powerful movements such as gripping a fist.■ The hip axis swings and moves greatly forward. In addition, the rear skirt expands greatly, allowing it to move backwards.■ The block on the side of the chest is responsible for the movement of the part corresponding to the scapula, and is designed so that the movable axis of the shoulder is not exposed by the movement that opens outward.[Accessories]■ Beam rifle × 1■ Shield × 1■ Beam saber × 2

title: Gundam HGUC 1/144 #233 Messer Model Kit
hg-1-144-messer
description:
Gundam HGUC 1/144 #233 Messer Model Kit

Messer (provisional) appearing in "Mobile Suit Gundam Flash Hathaway" has a movable gimmick inside the fuselage and appears in the HG series!
■ By providing movable parts in various places, it has a structure that maximizes the action pose of Messer.■ Side armor is equipped with a slide gimmick that allows room for the movement of the legs.■ Beam rifle, beam saber, and shield are included.[Accessories]■ Beam rifle × 1■ Shield × 1■ Beam saber × 2

title: HG 1/144 YMS-03 Waff
hg-1-144-yms-03-waff
description:
Bandai continues their early Zeon mobile suit releases from the hit series “Mobile Suit Gundam: The Origin” with this new great looking High Grade YMS-03 Vaffu!  This kit features parts molded in multiple colors and easy to build snap-fit construction!  Comes with two axes, a bazooka and a shield!  Arm Attachments can also be swapped with pieces from the Prototype Gouf kit to give you extra customizability!


Mobile Suit Gundam The Origin III’s Zaku predecessor, the YMS-03 Waff, is available in HG!
Tetron stickers are included to recreate the markings of this early ancestor of the Zaku.
Flexible joints let it pose in a variety of ways, and its arms can be swapped with the HG Prototype Gouf and Revised Mobile Worker!
It even includes a bazooka, shield, and heat hawk!
http://www.gundamplanet.com/media/catalog/detail/hg-yms-03-waff-gundam-the-origin-ver-desc.jpg

title: Blue Destiny Unit 3 (Exam) "Gundam: The Blue Destiny", Bandai HGUC 1/144
blue-destiny-unit-3-exam-gundam-the-blue-destiny-hg-1-144
description:
Blue Destiny Unit 3 (Exam) "Gundam: The Blue Destiny", Bandai HGUC 1/144
All units unite! The “Blue Destiny Unit 3” finally joins Units 1 & 2 in the latest HG format! Now, you can finally recreate the battle of destiny between Yuu Kajima and Nimbus Schterzen by displaying it with the separately sold HG Blue Destiny Unit 2 “Exam”! Unit 3’s iconic shield and “Double Barrel beam Rifle” consist of newly assembled parts, which is used by the GM Dominance in Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story: The Blue Destiny. Using the included stickers you can even choose to recreate the “Exam System Activation Mode!” The wide range of articulation in this kit allow for poses that closely resemble the image of the MS featured in the series. Equip a variety of armaments for a great range of different action poses! Set includes Shield, 2 Beam Sabers, Double Barrel Beam Rifle, Space backpack, and 100mm (4 inch) Machine gun. Runner x9. title: Guncannon Mobility Test Type/Firepower Test Type "Gundam The Origin", Bandai HG 1/144
guncannon-mobility-test-type-firepower-test-type-gundam-the-origin-hg-1-144
description: This kit grants you the ability to create either one of two types of Mobile Suits! Choose between assembling the Mobility Test Type or the Firepower Test Type! A variety of weapons are included and are interchangeable with the "HG Guncannon (Iron Cavalry Squadron)". Marking decals designed by Hajime Katoki are included! With a wide range of movement, which is a feature of the "The Origin" series, this model kit is capable of assuming a wide variety of poses. Set includes MS machine gun x1, Rifle x1, normal hand (left and right) x1 each, gun wielding hand x1, mobility test type head and forearm (right) x1, mobility test type shoulder mounted gatling gun (left and right) x1, firepower test type head and forearm, Firepower test type shoulder mounted heavy caliber cannon (left and right) x1 each, and display stand (BA-1) x1. Runner x9. Marking sticker x1. Instruction manual x1.

title: HGUC 1/144 Neo Zeong
hg-1-144-neo-zeong
description:
The Neo Zeong is ready to invade your Gundam lineup! At 86cm tall and 50cm wide, this assertively-sized kit will be impossible to miss once assembled! An in-scale Sinaju is included, as are the long and short versions of its bazooka.  Its custom-designed stand includes a sturdy acrylic rod to keep this monster safely upright. Its parts are precolored; snap-fit assembly makes it easy to put together (although please be aware this kit has more than 500 parts!), and it will be posable, too. The instruction manual is included. Order this history-making kit today!
Note: This huge, heavy (7.88 kg, or more than 17 lbs.!) kit will be sent in the shipping carton in which it came from Bandai. As a result, it will not be able to be combined with any other items for shipping. Thanks for your understanding!

hg-1-144-60-pmx-001-palace-athene
description: A very distinctive design, the Palace-Athene finally comes to the HGUC lineup! While it looks complex, the kit is molded all in colour and features snap assembly, so you needn't worry; stickers are included for detail, and polycaps both assist with the building (holding joints together) and make the joints movable. There is no base included with this kit, though it is compatible with the bases that are included with the HGUC Asshimar and HGUC Gabthley.

title: HGUC 1/144 #07 RX-75 Guntank
hg-1-144-07-rx-75-guntank
description:
Driven by Hayato, and almost as regular a fixture in the original anime as Amuro and the Gundam, the Guntank has languished for years with only a sub-par kit to represent it. Bandai has now corrected this injustice with a top-quality HG rendering of this longtime favorite!
Tracks are made of flexible, easy to assemble plastic strips, but they don't move on the completed kit. Arms, back cannons and cockpit/head are posable. Molded in the final colors and featuring snap-fit assembly.

title: HGUC 1/144 #101 RX-0 Unicorn Gundam (Unicorn Mode) + Unicorn Head
hg-1-144-101-rx-0-unicorn-gundam-unicorn-mode-unicorn-head
description: This fantastic offering of the Unicorn Mode version of the titular mecha from "Mobile Suit Gundam UC" anime is represented with high-quality proportion and sharp detailing to its anime counterpart. This snap-fit plastic kit comes molded in color and features newly introduced polycap joints that allow for a wider range of posing possibilities! It can be armed with the included weaponry consisting of two beam sabers, a hyper bazooka, and a shield. Foil stickers are provided for detail. Includes exploded-view pictorial-type instructions, with notes in Japanese.

title: HGUC Gunpla Starter Set
hg-gunpla-starter-set
description: The Gunpla Starter set is perfect for those looking to get into the world of Gundam Plastic Models, times two! With this set you get to build the HGUC RX-78-2 Gundam and the Zaku II. Both kits come molded in color and utilize poly-caps for joints. Also included in this set is a How-to Guide showing you what tools you need, how to properly remove the parts from the runners, and details the assembly. The guide also has a section showing you how to 'Step Up' your gunpla through the use of glue and markers.

the-origin-1-144-mw-01-mobile-worker-model-01-late-type-mash
description:
The Origin - 1/144 MW-01 Mobile Worker Model 01 Late Type (Mash)



The secret Mobile Suit development project history is revealed! This Gundam The Origin Movie Worker Late Type (Mash) High Grade 1:144 Scale Model Kit has been faithfully recreated from the designs in Gundam The Origin anime adaptation. This Gundam's lights, winches, and cockpit have been precisely molded. Kit also includes interchangeable manipulator, shield arm, 9 runners, stickers, and instruction manual. Once fully assembled, this Gundam stands 5-inches tall.

title: 1/144 HGUC RX-78-2 Gundam
1-144-hg-rx-78-2-gundam
description:
Adopting the latest format, both easy assembly and high mobility are realized.
Similar parts amount, but the number of movable joints is increased 150%, compared to HGUC RX-78-2 Gundam launched in 2001.
Powerful poses seen in the anime can be recreated.
Parts are located on the runners under consideration to maximize easy-assembly.
"Kusabi (wedge) Gate" is adopted to the runners to minimize gate marks.
The double-jointed elbows and knees enable the MS to kneel down on one knee, and unsheathe the Beam Saber.
A Beam Rifle, two Beam Sabers, and a Hyper Bazooka (mounts on the waist) are included.
Weapon-wielding hands and open hands (both left and right) are included to recreate various poses.
Runner x5, Foil sticker x1, Instruction manual x1

title: HGUC 1/144 #144 Base Jabber (Unicorn Ver)
hg-1-144-144-base-jabber-unicorn-ver
description:
HGUC 1/144 #144 Base Jabber (Unicorn Ver)
This E.F.S.F Sub Flight System, also known as the Base Jabber, consists of some very large (for an HGUC) parts but don't let that fool you. There's plenty of detail to be found. The Base Jabber is designed to work with a variety of 1/144 scale HG kits and even comes with foil marking stickers for extra detail. It is able to mount to a Bandai Action Base or can stand on its own thanks to included landing gear parts. Pictured on the box art is the 1/144 HGUC RGM-96X Jesta Gundam which is sold separately

title: HGUC MSN-04 SAZABI
hg-msn-04-sazabi
description:
Bandai Hobby #88 Sazabi "Char's Counterattack" 1/144 - High Grade Universal Century
The mobile suit "Sazabi" from "Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack" joins the HGUC lineup. An all-new assembly system allows all parts to be detached and re-attached. New polycaps allow for enhanced possibility. Re-creates the massive image of the mobile suit with thick armor plating. Includes beam rifle, beam saber, beam tomahawk, shield, and funnel system, with open and closed individual funnels.

title: HGUC 1/144 MSN-06S Sinanju Neo Zeon Mobile Suit
hg-1-144-msn-06s-sinanju-neo-zeon-mobile-suit
description:
Reminiscent of all the Red Comet’s suits, particularly the Sazabi, the Sinanju is the rival suit to Unicorn Gundam in the latest Gundam series! Piloted by Full Frontal, this suit has many devastating abilities to match all those of the Unicorn, and this kit recreates all of them. Featuring effect parts for the beam blades, a beam saber, and articulating thrusters on the backpack, this bad boy has everything you could want from an HG kit! Foil stickers are also included for adding that Sinanju flair.
